screen.better_updates.update_available.d: Do you want to download the update?
screen.better_updates.update_available.h:
This message get you when there's an update available for Random Thingz.
Click yes to download it, no, to continue.
New version: %s
screen.better_updates.modules.help: This screen is for managing modules in Random Thingz.
